item.title: How to add pk shop
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

ah sorry i didnt answer you…

well this is a method you declared as an integer.

i’ll expllain it in detail now.

public int pvpvalue = 2000; // max ID is 7989

                public int getpvpvalue(int itemID) {
                                if(itemID == 35) {// armadyl godsword
                        pvpvalue = 75;
                }
                                if(itemID == 667) {// bandos godsword
                        pvpvalue = 15;
                }
                                if(itemID == 2402) {// saradomin godsword
                        pvpvalue = 50;
                }
                                if(itemID == 746) {// zamorak godsword
                        pvpvalue = 30;
                }
                                if(itemID == 642) {// 3rd age melee platebody
                        pvpvalue = 20;
                }
                                if(itemID == 652) {// 3rd age melee platelegs
                        pvpvalue = 20;
                }
                                if(itemID == 662) {//3rd age melee full helm
                        pvpvalue = 20;
                }
                                if(itemID == 640) {//3rd age mage robes (top)
                        pvpvalue = 20;
                }
                                if(itemID == 650) {//3rd age mage robes (bottom)
                        pvpvalue = 20;
                }
                                if(itemID == 660) {//3rd age mage hat
                        pvpvalue = 20;
                }
                                if(itemID == 638) {//3rd age range top
                        pvpvalue = 20;
                }
                                if(itemID == 648) {//3rd age range legs
                        pvpvalue = 20;
                }
                                if(itemID == 658) {//3rd age range coif
                        pvpvalue = 20;
                }
                                if(itemID == 3629) {//3rd age vambraces
                        pvpvalue = 20;
                }
                                if(itemID == 2520) {// void knight top
                        pvpvalue = 30;
                }
                                if(itemID == 2522) {// void knight bottom
                        pvpvalue = 30;
                }
                                if(itemID == 2524) {// void ranger helm
                        pvpvalue = 30;
                }
                                if(itemID == 2526) {// void melee helm
                        pvpvalue = 30;
                }
                                if(itemID == 2518) {// void mage helm
                        pvpvalue = 30;
                }                               
                                if(itemID == 4827) {// dark bow
                        pvpvalue = 75;
                }
                                if(itemID == 2621) {// dragon fire shield
                        pvpvalue = 50;
                }
                                if(itemID == 2904) {// dragon boots
                        pvpvalue = 50;
                }
                                if(itemID == 7608) {// armadyl chestplate
                        pvpvalue = 100;
                }
                                if(itemID == 7609) {// armadyl plateskirt
                        pvpvalue = 100        ;
                }
                                if(itemID == 6570) {// firecape
                        pvpvalue = 10000;
                }
                                if(itemID == 7449) {// meat tenderizer
                        pvpvalue = 150;
                }
                                if(itemID == 1107) {// bandos chestplate
                        pvpvalue = 45;
                }
                                if(itemID == 1077) {// bandos tassets
                        pvpvalue = 45;
                }
                                if(itemID == 7611) {// dragon full helm
                        pvpvalue = 30;
                }
                                if(itemID == 3753) {// helm of neitiznot
                        pvpvalue = 10;
                }
                return pvpvalue;
                }
 public int pvpvalue = 2000;

this means that any default item’s pvp value is 2k just ignore this lol

 public int getpvpvalue(int itemID) {

obvious really, this is what shows the pvp points value of the items.

                                if(itemID == 35) {// armadyl godsword
                        pvpvalue = 75;
                }

if item id is 35, then it’s pvpvalue will be 75.

there you go… just put this in client.javaabove/under any public int/voids.

item.title: How to add pk shop
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“Failurescape, post:5, topic:329724”]Code: [Select]public int pvpvalue = 2000; // max ID is 7989 public int getpvpvalue(int itemID) { if(itemID == 35) {// armadyl godsword pvpvalue = 75; } if(itemID == 667) {// bandos godsword pvpvalue = 15; } if(itemID == 2402) {// saradomin godsword pvpvalue = 50; } if(itemID == 746) {// zamorak godsword pvpvalue = 30; } if(itemID == 642) {// 3rd age melee platebody pvpvalue = 20; } if(itemID == 652) {// 3rd age melee platelegs pvpvalue = 20; } if(itemID == 662) {//3rd age melee full helm pvpvalue = 20; } if(itemID == 640) {//3rd age mage robes (top) pvpvalue = 20; } if(itemID == 650) {//3rd age mage robes (bottom) pvpvalue = 20; } if(itemID == 660) {//3rd age mage hat pvpvalue = 20; } if(itemID == 638) {//3rd age range top pvpvalue = 20; } if(itemID == 648) {//3rd age range legs pvpvalue = 20; } if(itemID == 658) {//3rd age range coif pvpvalue = 20; } if(itemID == 3629) {//3rd age vambraces pvpvalue = 20; } if(itemID == 2520) {// void knight top pvpvalue = 30; } if(itemID == 2522) {// void knight bottom pvpvalue = 30; } if(itemID == 2524) {// void ranger helm pvpvalue = 30; } if(itemID == 2526) {// void melee helm pvpvalue = 30; } if(itemID == 2518) {// void mage helm pvpvalue = 30; } if(itemID == 4827) {// dark bow pvpvalue = 75; } if(itemID == 2621) {// dragon fire shield pvpvalue = 50; } if(itemID == 2904) {// dragon boots pvpvalue = 50; } if(itemID == 7608) {// armadyl chestplate pvpvalue = 100; } if(itemID == 7609) {// armadyl plateskirt pvpvalue = 100 ; } if(itemID == 6570) {// firecape pvpvalue = 10000; } if(itemID == 7449) {// meat tenderizer pvpvalue = 150; } if(itemID == 1107) {// bandos chestplate pvpvalue = 45; } if(itemID == 1077) {// bandos tassets pvpvalue = 45; } if(itemID == 7611) {// dragon full helm pvpvalue = 30; } if(itemID == 3753) {// helm of neitiznot pvpvalue = 10; } return pvpvalue; }
pretty self explanatory really.
which file does this go into thanks so much!![/quote]

Your name fits you well…

item.title: How to add pk shop
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

well this really stumped me at the beginning but finally i was able to add one to my server! here’s how to do it…

  1. open your config folder.
  2. open the “shops.cfg” file.
  3. add this OR replace it if there is already a shop 1:
shop = 1	PvP_Point_Exchange				2	2	35	999999999	667	999999999	2518	999999999	2520	999999999	2522	999999999	2524	999999999	2526	999999999	1077	999999999	1107	999999999	2904	999999999	2621	999999999	7608	999999999	7609	999999999	4827	999999999	7611	999999999	7449	999999999	2402	999999999	746	999999999	642	999999999	652	999999999	662	999999999	640	999999999	650	999999999	660	999999999	638	999999999	648	999999999	658	999999999	3629	999999999
  1. open your client.java
  2. search for something like this:
			} else if (NPCID == 546) {
				// Zaff
				PutNPCCoords = true;
				WanneShop = 24; // Varrock Staff Shop
  1. add this right above the else if:
			} else if (NPCID == 546) { // the 546 is the NPC ID you want.
				// Zaff
				PutNPCCoords = true;
				WanneShop = 1; // Varrock Staff Shop
  1. save your client.java
  2. add this int:
public int pvpvalue = 2000; // max ID is 7989

		public int getpvpvalue(int itemID) {
				if(itemID == 35) {// armadyl godsword
			pvpvalue = 75;
		}
				if(itemID == 667) {// bandos godsword
			pvpvalue = 15;
		}
				if(itemID == 2402) {// saradomin godsword
			pvpvalue = 50;
		}
				if(itemID == 746) {// zamorak godsword
			pvpvalue = 30;
		}
				if(itemID == 642) {// 3rd age melee platebody
			pvpvalue = 20;
		}
				if(itemID == 652) {// 3rd age melee platelegs
			pvpvalue = 20;
		}
				if(itemID == 662) {//3rd age melee full helm
			pvpvalue = 20;
		}
				if(itemID == 640) {//3rd age mage robes (top)
			pvpvalue = 20;
		}
				if(itemID == 650) {//3rd age mage robes (bottom)
			pvpvalue = 20;
		}
				if(itemID == 660) {//3rd age mage hat
			pvpvalue = 20;
		}
				if(itemID == 638) {//3rd age range top
			pvpvalue = 20;
		}
				if(itemID == 648) {//3rd age range legs
			pvpvalue = 20;
		}
				if(itemID == 658) {//3rd age range coif
			pvpvalue = 20;
		}
				if(itemID == 3629) {//3rd age vambraces
			pvpvalue = 20;
		}
				if(itemID == 2520) {// void knight top
			pvpvalue = 30;
		}
				if(itemID == 2522) {// void knight bottom
			pvpvalue = 30;
		}
				if(itemID == 2524) {// void ranger helm
			pvpvalue = 30;
		}
				if(itemID == 2526) {// void melee helm
			pvpvalue = 30;
		}
				if(itemID == 2518) {// void mage helm
			pvpvalue = 30;
		}				
				if(itemID == 4827) {// dark bow
			pvpvalue = 75;
		}
				if(itemID == 2621) {// dragon fire shield
			pvpvalue = 50;
		}
				if(itemID == 2904) {// dragon boots
			pvpvalue = 50;
		}
				if(itemID == 7608) {// armadyl chestplate
			pvpvalue = 100;
		}
				if(itemID == 7609) {// armadyl plateskirt
			pvpvalue = 100	;
		}
				if(itemID == 6570) {// firecape
			pvpvalue = 10000;
		}
				if(itemID == 7449) {// meat tenderizer
			pvpvalue = 150;
		}
				if(itemID == 1107) {// bandos chestplate
			pvpvalue = 45;
		}
				if(itemID == 1077) {// bandos tassets
			pvpvalue = 45;
		}
				if(itemID == 7611) {// dragon full helm
			pvpvalue = 30;
		}
				if(itemID == 3753) {// helm of neitiznot
			pvpvalue = 10;
		}
		return pvpvalue;
		}

pretty self explanatory really.

				if(itemID == 3753) {// helm of neitiznot
			pvpvalue = 10;
		}

3753 is the item ID, pvpvalue is how much it will cost. ignore the name i put in, this is because i use crazy PvP as my source.

to add a new item, copy and paste an existing entry and change the item ID, and change the pvpvalue as much as you would like.

  1. search for String ShopAdd = "";
  2. add this under it:
				int pvpvv = getpvpvalue(removeID);
					} if (MyShopID == 1) {
            sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ pvpvv +" PvP Points");
  1. search for “if (MyShopID ==”
  2. put above it this:
                if (MyShopID == 1) { // PvP shop ID
                    if (pkpoints >= Pvpv) { // states that if character's pk points are bigger than pvpv, it will continue the rest
                        if (freeSlots() > 0) {// states that if the character has 1 free inventory slot it continues
                            pkpoints -= Pvpv;// removes Pvpv from your pkpoints
                            addItem(itemID, 1);// add's the item to your inventory
			    deleteItem(itemID, 1);// i added this because on my server for some reason it would add two items instead of one. on yours it might not be the same, just remove it if you get bugs
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;// removes 1 from the item in the shop
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                            if ((fromSlot + 1)
                                    > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
                                server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                            }
                        } else {// this is for the free slots one, it says that if you don't have more than 1 free inventory slot it continues.
                            sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");// obvious
                            break;// stops the code from repeating
                        }
                    } else {// this one is for the pkpoints one
                        sM("Not enough PvP points for this item.");// obvious
			deleteItem(itemID, 1);//delete's the item instead of adding it.
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] += 1;// adds 1 to the item in the shop instead of removing it.
                    }
                }
				
            }

and there you go! tell me if you have any errors or something.

Read full topic
